EquipmentRings32.name: EquipmentRings32
EquipmentRings32.desc: All kills in World 4 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 5 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

GemP25.name: GemP25
GemP25.desc: Gives you a random Circle Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +4% DROP RATE, +2% ALL STAT, +3% DAMAGE, and +2% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

EquipmentHats81.name: EquipmentHats81
EquipmentHats81.desc: Arr matey, this thar Premium Hat gives +10% Drop Rate, so ye can get back to plunderin' across the 7 seas... er, 5 worlds!

EquipmentKeychain22.name: EquipmentKeychain22
EquipmentKeychain22.desc: This keychain comes with +20% Mob Respawn bonus! Currently, the best possible Mob Respawn keychain is 12%, so this is the best Mob Respawn Keychain in the game!

desc: Use this on a 3 star card to upgrade it to 4 stars! You can use it on any 3 star card you have, and hey, its freakin free, so I will be offended if you don't buy it!
Use this on a 3 star card to upgrade it to 4 stars! You can use it on any 3 star card you have, it's up to you! Each purchase allows for one card of your choice to be upgraded.
